name: 2 - Prepared
description:
This response shows a limited amount of valid reasoning and some evidence to support a claim. There is minimally developed introduction and conclusion, with beginning skill in language and a limited command of Standard English.
To improve your score: Develop an introduction and conclusion in your essay. Spend some time studying Standard English grammar. You have included some evidence to support your claim, but you need to expand it. Try writing about passages or articles that you have read. Use these 4 steps: 1. Plan it; 2. Write a quick draft; 3. Evaluate what you have written; 4. Rewrite it.
